name: Prismatic Eye
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You create a pair of invisible eyes. One eye floats 30 feet above a point within 30 feet of you, while the other eye flies to a point within 1 mile that you can see. The distant eye scans everything in a 60 foot radius around it, which the nearby eye projects onto the ground directly below it. The distant eye can detect hidden or invisible creatures this way, but cannot see through objects or into containers.

You can move either eye for 2 AP. The spell ends if you cast it again.
